name: reclapp-saas-starter
description: SaaS Starter Example - Multi-tenant application with subscriptions

scripts.generate: cd ../.. && npx ts-node generator/cli.ts generate examples/saas-starter/contracts/main.reclapp -o examples/saas-starter/src -t full-stack
scripts.dev: npm run generate && cd src && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run generate && cd src && npm run build
